Cameroon.png.description: Cameroon flag: 3 vertical stripes, green on L, red in center, yellow on right. solid 5-pointed yellow star in the center of the flag

Chile.png.description: Chile flag: Bottom half is red. Top half has a blue square on the left with a solid 5-pointed white star. The rest of the top half is white.

Norway.png.description: Norway flag: Red with a blue cross splitting it into 4 unequal parts, the short end being on the left. The blue cross has a white border nearly equal in width to the cross itself on all sides that do not touch the edge of the flag.

Panama.png.description: Panama flag: Split into 4 quadrants. Top left is white with a solid 5-pointed blue star. Top right is red. Bottom left is blue. Bottom right is white with a solid 5-pointed red star.

flag1.png.description: White rectangle with a quarter of a red circle in the bottom left corner

flag2.png.description: White rectangle with a red semicircle in the center of the left edge

flag3.png.description: White rectangle with a quarter of a red circle in the top right corner

flag4.png.description: White rectangle with a red circle semi circle centered on the top edge

moving-red-dot.png.description: Four images of a modified Japanese flag with the red dot's location moving
